name: Aloe Vera
description: Best known for treating burns and skin irritation, the aloe plant is low maintenance and a great air purifier.

name: Bromeliad
description: Low maintenance and adaptable to any living conditions, provides beautiful tropical blooms.

name: Corn Plant
description: Native to dry conditions, this beginner plant is low maintenance and is a great statement piece.

name: Fiddle Leaf Fig
description: This beautiful tree loves lots of humidity and sun and can grow as high as the ceiling indoors.

name: Money Tree
description: Thought to bring money and wealth, this tree's beautiful foilage makes it a show stopper.

name: Monstera
description: Known to grow "delisiosa" fruit in the wild, this vining plant would do best by a sunny window.

name: Majestic Palm
description: This tree loves tropical climates and draws eyes with it's unique upward-growing leaves.

name: Peace Lily
description: With its dark leaves and beautiful blooms; this addition will make you the envy of your friends.

name: Marble Pothos
description: This vining plant grows in many different light condition and makes a great addition to any space.

name: Snake Plant
description: The godfather of low maintenance, this perfect beginner plant grows in any light condition.

name: Spider Plant
description: It's hanging leaves and offspring earns this plant it's name. A great centerpiece in any room.

name: ZZ Plant
description: Growing in any light condition, this low maintenance gem is quite the crowd pleaser.
